Desk Organizer: Hollow out the inside of the rubber duck and use it as a desk organizer for pens, pencils, and other small office supplies.
Bookend: Attach small hooks or magnets to the rubber duck's underside and use it as a bookend to hold books and magazines on a bookshelf.
Plant Marker: Write the name of each plant on the rubber duck and use it as a fun and colorful plant marker in a garden or indoor plants.
Soap Dish: Cut a hole in the bottom of the rubber duck and use it as a soap dish for the bathroom. The hole will allow water to drain out, keeping the soap dry.
Paperweight: Use the rubber duck as a paperweight to keep papers from blowing away in the wind. The hole in the bottom will allow for airflow while keeping the papers in place.
